I bought this game ages ago, completed it, and then went on to complete Portal 2 afterwards. This game is truly epic. I'm not sure why I didn't write a review beforehand, especially as there have been so many reviews already, but still, why not.

When I first started playing it seemed like a fun little puzzle game, but it quickly evolved into something bigger, something with a story. You go from completing puzzles in little rooms to defeating a rogue AI (No spoilers), and yet the game retains its core game mechanics. While I loved Portal 2 aswell, this game will allways be my favourite, its just better, in my opinion, and is probably one of my favourite games I've ever played. 

With its cheap price (Due to the steam sales), theres never been a better time (Well, prehaps at launch, but still) to get this game. I thoughly recommend it.

A valve classic, and to be remembered for all the right reasons. A well thought out and implemented game, combining problem solving and action makes for a brilliant play, even though it's getting on a bit in terms of years, this in no way should dissuade you from buying this. This is a must-play for anyone, although I would recommend waiting till the sales as it regularly is avaiable at a bargain price, I got it in the valve complete pack in the summer sales and that pack was worth every penny.

Portal est un jeu de réflexion à la première personne. C’est vraiment une expérience vidéoludique  à ne pas manquer. La célèbre GLaDOS est son humour caustique, donne une ambiance troublante et drôle.  La difficulté des puzzles est bien gérée, toujours croissante en avançant dans les tests. Et si c’est trop simple la première fois, il existe un mode avancé. Le jeu est malheureusement très court, je le conseille donc en solde ou en pack.

When I built my gaming PC last month I felt the need to play all Valve games , as I hear so much praise about them. I have been holding off, but the other day I bought the portal bundle. $6.24 for two games that are both overwhelmingly positive on the review side. Why not ? I boot up the game and thihk damn only 19 level / chambers and quickly get dissapointed. After completing the last chamber everything changed. The ending of this game is PHENOMENAL. I began to appreciate the game and its simple plot. The ending when you are running through the facility is immense fun and the way you get around is awesome. It is a challenge, but my god when you find out what to do, it feels great. I can now say I am beyond happy I bought this game and especialy for the low price point. It is a 9.5/10 for me.
Amazing game! Love the tricky lvls.

Había oído hablar de este juego muy bien, pero me había resistido a comprarlo por que me pareció "un plataformas sin interés". Pues bien. Me equivoqué. 

Es dificil encontrar un juego más sencillo y a la vez más completo que "Portal". Con una historia sencilla (salir del complejo) y unas enormes dosis de humor negro, me ha parecido un juego divertido y con una mecánica espectaluramente sencilla pero bien aprovechada. Es increible como puede sacarse tanto jugo a tan poco. Los movimientos no podían ser más basicos. Crear portal azul, crear portal naranja, agarrar objeto y moverse.  Solo con esto te sumerge en un mundo de trampas, laberintos y atajos, con unos toques maravillosos de ciencia ficción. La IA que te va guiando por las habitaciones (GLaDOS) es simplemente magnífica y tiene una personalidad y unas frases inolvidables. Eso por no hablar del final, y sobre todo de la canción de los créditos. Inigualable.

A por el dos que voy.

Original, inventive and creative. These are a few words to describe Portal. 
It's a short but memorable and well crafted game that will tax your brain to think outside the box.
The manipulation of the Portal Gun and Portals is outstanding, and will engauge you in ways you couldn't even have imagined in conventional puzzle games.

This games takes creativity and throws a party with it: a game you must try out at some point, even if you don't imagine it'd be your type of game.

Jeu extrèmement prenant. Bien que ce jeu date de 2007, il reste à mes yeux un super jeu, qui ne vieillit pas. En effet, les graphismes importent peu dans un jeu de ce genre.
Les énigmes sont très bien pensées et parfois complexes, mais on ne reste jamais bloqué trop longtemps dans un niveau.

Le seul bémol : jeu un peu court, 2h30 pour finir la série de niveaux principaux (sans compter les niveaux à difficulté accrue et autres)

De plus, une autre raison d'aimer ce jeu, la voix de GLaDOS, qui nous suit tout au long de l'aventure, qui commente nos actions, nous ment et nous teste.

Bref, ne pas hésiter à le prendre durant ces périodes de soldes steam, et prendre le 2 au passage (6€ les deux jeux, que demander de plus ?).
Juego muy entretenido pero muy corto (3 o 4 horas). Muy recomendable comprarlo.

Portal is an innovative and fun game that I can fully recommend. 

-Graphics: The game still looks quite good - something about Aperture's aesthetics makes this game age really well, graphics-wise.

-Story: Told in a very minimalist way. Nobody ever tells you what the heck is going on, but you can piece some of it together yourself. 

-Gameplay: Ridiculously fun, even though the game sometimes feels like a 2-hour-something long tutorial.  I probably prefer those tests over the ones in Portal 2, actually - you get to play around with momentum a lot, which is always fun.

-Length: Really short. You can easily finish the story in 2.5 hours, like I did, and most likely in less than that, even. Finding everything without a guide will probably take you a while, however, and there's also some bonus stuff to do. So basically, the game is short but sweet.

So, if you've never played a Portal game, playing this one before moving on to Portal 2 is a pretty good idea. 
If you did play Portal 2 first and are now wondering wether it's worth getting this game, too: Yes, it totally is.
Original, fun and challenging, I love the dialogue and the story. High replay value because of achievements and additional test chambers. Short, but definitely worth your while.

Nice little first person problem solving game using physics.
-Game length arround 5hours + a few advance maps to do at the end(same maps from the main story just slightly harder)
-Makes you use your brain so feels like a nice brain trainning exercise.
-refreshing game style, unique experience.

-Not to much "re-playability" as once you know all the answers the fun is gone (Portal 2 though has a better community map area and co-op
I love it.

Portal is a must-have, a classic that will only continue to grow in legendary status as the years pass. It's blend of puzzles, a unique world manipulating gun, and dark humor make it something that MUST be experienced at least once by all. Even after 8 years, the game still manages to be just as engaging as it was when it first dropped back in 2007.

Nice puzzle platformer. 

The story in this game isn't that much developped, you don't know much about the characters and origins of the characters (you can read comics though), but the game mechanics are really interesting, unique, and well thought. 

I liked this game because it was a pretty nice brain exercice which was fun at time thanks to the humour of Galdos, but which is much more developped in the sequel Portal 2.

The challenges you can play after you've completed the storyline are pretty fun to play, but wont be a thing as exciting as the singleplayer story because it reuses the same levels from it, and just asks you to play them faster, and some other stuff.

There isn't much to say about this game since it's a pretty short story to play, but its low price forgives that lack of content. This game is best to get on sales, and should be bought with Portal 2 which explores much more the characters and universe of the game.

포탈(October, 2007), 포탈2(April, 2011)

 오락이 여러 문화생활과 다른 것은 능동적인 점이다. 물론 영화감상이나 독서 등에서의 능동적 참여를 부정하는 것은 아니지만, 명백히 오락이 더 능동적인 형태임은 확실하다. 그렇기에 감성유희 외에 이성유희를 유도하는 필연적 결과가 나타난다. 전통적인 바둑 수준을 넘어 원시적인 가위바위보를 할 때에도 이성적인 판단을 하는 유희를 하고자 한다. 그러므로 전자 오락에서도 퍼즐이라는 형태가 유지되는 쪽을 선호하는 개인적 취향은 오락의 본질과 맞닿아 있는 셈이다. 또한 가장 성공한 이십세기 전자오락이 테트리스인 점도 오락의 근본을 나타내기 때문이다. 포탈은 그 계보를 잇고 있는 오락이다.

 포탈은 공간을 연결시키는 문을 생성시켜 진행하는 것을 특징으로 하는 오락이다. 그 외에 관성이나 중력 등의 물리적 법칙을 응용하거나 기타 주어진 장치들을 사용하여 문제를 해결하는 방식 등이 있다. 단순히 평면의 테트리스를 공간으로 이끌어낸 오락으로 여기기에는 다른 축도 고려해야 한다. 바로 서사이다. 전자 오락이 지닐 수 있는 장점은 책이나 영화에서 표현되는 서사성을 가져올 수 있다는 것이다. 퍼즐이라는 이성유희에 이야기라는 감성유희가 더해질 수 있다는 측면은 전자 오락만의 매력적인 요소가 된다. 포탈의 이야기가 어느 정도 흥미로운지는 여기에 다 적을 수 없으니 생략하겠다.

 전자 오락을 평가하는 척도는 매우 다양해서 실제로 장르가 다르면 동일 선상에서 비교하기 어려운 점이 많다. 예컨대 같은 도서나 영화를 비교하는 것도 난해한 점이 있겠지만, 어떤 도서와 어떤 영화 중에 어느 것이 더 뛰어난 지를 평가하는 것은 더욱 곤란한 질문이다. 그렇지만 전자 오락이라는 특성을 파악해 보자면 포탈은 지금까지 만들어진 전자 오락 중 가장 완벽했다. 안타깝게도 엘더스크롤 V : 스카이림(November, 2011)이라는 야겜에 묻혀 콩라인이 되어버렸지만.

Pray for Companion Cube (╥﹏╥)
Very creative game with smart puzzles and compelling story with a lot of humor.

全成就之后，我觉得自己有点资格来写一篇评测了。

游戏时间20个小时左右。

游戏的难度，仁者见仁吧。反正我觉得全成就并不容易，我会说在普通的流程中我都卡了嘛？我会说在高级房间里绞尽乳汁了嘛？我会说因为挑战中的各种金牌我都快炸了最后只能用各种BUG过的吗？

portal的创意确实不错，第一次看到蓝黄两个门连接两个空间，穿过去穿回来，感觉非常有意思。解锁过“终端速度”这个成就应该都会有这种经历，在天花板和地面上各开一个传送门，然后无限掉落。我第一次经历的时候，只感叹，原来游戏还能这么玩，大开眼界。

如果真的喜欢portal这个游戏，推荐你将游戏里的“开发者注释”也玩一遍。这个栏目里有很多开发者的想法，很有趣。也能了解到portal一些幕后的故事。

portal虽然不是恐怖游戏，但是确实能感受到一股压抑的气氛，永远密封的房间，四处遍布的摄像头，墙上监视者的房间，越来越邪恶的AI，而压抑在实验室19最后看到火坑的时候达到了顶峰，然后在逃亡的路上，相信很多人都会注意到墙壁上触目惊心的手掌图案，还有“help me”以及“cake is a lie”的字样，越玩越能感受到这个游戏黑暗的一面，通关的时候我只想说，终于逃出来了，这破地方。不得不说portal在这点上营造的非常好。

最后的片尾曲《still alive》非常动听。

很喜欢这款游戏，如果它的BUG更少一点的话。
I have been so late for the cake. But damn was it still worth it.

Oyun gerçekten çok güzel, ama kısa oynanış süresi tatmin edici değildi. Daha uzun süre oynamak isterdim ama kısa sürede bitti oyun. Final müziği gerçekten çok güzeldi, hele ki oyunu Türkçe yama ile oynuyorsanız daha güzel. Oyunda ki asistana alışıyorsunuz. Yapay zekanın sizinle şakalaşması gerçekten güzel, oyun oynarken yüzünüzü güldürüyor sonuçta. Akıcı bir oynanış var ama dediğim gibi çok kısa sürdü. En yakın zamanda Portal 2'ye başlamayı düşünüyorum.

I'm not a big gamer, hell, I've always been pretty awful with games, but the first 14 portals were pretty easy to get through(with some thought), and the time flies by. Admittedly, I'm having some serious difficulties with 15, but it's been really fun and the first game I've gotten this into in a long time.
Buy this game. Right now. Do it. NO! Quit looking at the price, stop worrying that you can't feed yourself or pay off your mortgage. Forget your life and buy the stupid thing already.
